00070 void PRS_SourceSignalSet(unsigned int ch,
00071                          uint32_t source,
00072                          uint32_t signal,
00073                          PRS_Edge_TypeDef edge)
00074 {
00075   EFM_ASSERT(ch < PRS_CHAN_COUNT);
00076 
00077   PRS->CH[ch].CTRL = (source & _PRS_CH_CTRL_SOURCESEL_MASK)
00078                      | (signal & _PRS_CH_CTRL_SIGSEL_MASK)
00079                      | (uint32_t)edge;
00080 }
00081 
00082 #if defined( PRS_CH_CTRL_ASYNC )
00083 /***************************************************************************/
00111 void PRS_SourceAsyncSignalSet(unsigned int ch,
00112                               uint32_t source,
00113                               uint32_t signal)
00114 {
00115   EFM_ASSERT(ch < PRS_CHAN_COUNT);
00116 
00117   PRS->CH[ch].CTRL = PRS_CH_CTRL_ASYNC
00118                      | (source & _PRS_CH_CTRL_SOURCESEL_MASK)
00119                      | (signal & _PRS_CH_CTRL_SIGSEL_MASK)
00120                      | PRS_CH_CTRL_EDSEL_OFF;
00121 }
00122 #endif
